Only 180 appointments are given weekly.\n\nTo schedule an appointment, community members must call 646.596.1316 every Wednesday between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m.", "email": "", "url": "https://bronxworks.org/our-services/benefits-and-other-assistance/food-pantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1130 Grand Concourse", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10456", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8326862, "longitude": -73.9187597}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 596-1316", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
